question: [File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Consensus.AEDPoS/AEDPoSContract_GetConsensusBlockExtraData.cs] [Function: GetConsensusBlockExtraData()] [Authorization Bypass] Can any caller invoke GetConsensusBlockExtraData with arbitrary pubkey in triggerInformation (line 15-23) to generate consensus data for miners they don't control, potentially manipulating round state or block production statistics?
